Title: Performance Review System Design
Description: Designed and architected a comprehensive performance review tracking system
Acceptance Criteria: Complete system design with data flow diagrams and technical specifications
Success Notes: Successfully created comprehensive technical documentation and architecture blueprints
Rating Justification: Delivered complex system architecture that serves as foundation for entire project

Title: Azure DevOps Integration
Description: Implemented direct API integration with Azure DevOps for automated work item retrieval
Acceptance Criteria: Functional API client with error handling and data normalization
Success Notes: Successfully integrated with production Azure DevOps instance and automated data collection
Rating Justification: Eliminated manual data entry and created production-ready enterprise integration

Title: LLM Integration Architecture
Description: Replaced VS Code dependency with direct LLM API integration supporting multiple providers
Acceptance Criteria: Support for OpenAI GPT-4 Anthropic Claude and local Ollama models with fallback systems
Success Notes: Created flexible multi-provider architecture with robust error handling and fallback systems
Rating Justification: Significantly improved system reliability and removed external dependencies while adding advanced AI capabilities
